intro.content:
Here is your weekly roundup of positive inspiration.
On the menu today: Some mucic (actually a lot of music), two otters who fall in love and a fantastic balet of whales!

hero.title: A lovely Christmas initiative
hero.description: Disguised as Mrs. Claus, Fatima Sanson gives gifts and hugs to underprivileged children in Belo Horizonte.

randomArticles.title: Playing For Change
randomArticles.description: Song Around the World | Higher Ground | Stevie Wonder (thanks for sharing Marja!)

randomArticles.title: Madeline Forman
randomArticles.description: A 94-year-old woman rediscovered some music she recorded in the 1940s.

randomArticles.title: Tag is a sport!
randomArticles.description: The story of how tag became a professional sport

recipe.title: The recipe of Audrey Hepburn’s Penne...

animalCorner.title: Otter-ly in love!
animalCorner.description: Two lonely otters who lost their partners find happiness again after being matched online by their keepers.

animalCorner.title: Fishing duo captures breaching Humpback performance
animalCorner.description: A father-daughter duo out on Conception Bay, N.L., got the surprise of their lifetime
